name: SmartSifter
paper: OnLine Unsupervised Outlier Detection Using Finite Mixtures with Discounting Learning Algorithms
description: SmartSifter is an online outlier detection engine. It detects outliers in an online process through the online unsupervised learning of a probabilistic model using finite mixture model.
